<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770202636</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Family Story with Research</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Familie Geschichte mit Forschung</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Histoire de famille avec la recherche</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">História da família com pesquisa</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Storia della famiglia con ricerca</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Οικογενειακή ιστορία με την έρευνα</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Historia de la familia con la investigación</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Using the book, "When The Legends Die" and a Native American story-telling unit, students gather a family story of their own.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Humanities</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Social Sciences</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Das Verwenden des Buches, ", wenn die Legenden" 
und eine gebürtige amerikanische Geschichte-erklärende Maßeinheit 
sterben, Kursteilnehmer erfassen eine Familie Geschichte von ihren 
Selbst.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">L'utilisation du livre, "quand les légendes 
meurent" et une unité histoire-disante américaine indigène, des 
étudiants recueillent une histoire de famille de leurs propres.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Usar o livro, "quando as legendas morrem" e uma 
unidade história-dizendo americana nativa, estudantes recolhe uma 
história da família do seus próprios.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Usando il libro, "quando le leggende muoiono" e 
un'unità storia-dicente americana natale, allievi riunisce una
storia della famiglia dei loro propri.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Χρησιμοποίηση του βιβλίου, "όταν συλλέγουν ο κύβος 
μύθων" και μια εγγενής αμερικανική μονάδα ιστορία-αφήγησης, 
σπουδαστές μια οικογενειακή δικής τους ιστορία.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Usar el libro, "cuando las leyendas mueren" y una 
unidad historia-que dice americana nativa, los estudiantes recolecta 
una historia de la familia sus el propios.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Menschlichkeit</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Sozialwissenschaften</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Sciences humaines</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les Sciences Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Humanities</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciências Sociais</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Studi umanistici</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scienze Sociali</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ανθρωπότητες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Κοινωνικές επιστήμες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Humanidad</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ciencias Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <lifeCycle>

    </metadata>
  </description>
